info.name: MTS Device API (Updated Dec 2025)
info.description:
Complete API collection for Multi-Tech Systems IoT device management platform

Updated December 2025 with 50+ newly discovered endpoints including WAN management, security, monitoring, and notifications.

request.description: Returns process IDs (PIDs) for running LoRa services. A PID of 0 indicates the service is not running.

originalRequest.description: Returns process IDs (PIDs) for running LoRa services. A PID of 0 indicates the service is not running.

request.description: Retrieve registered LoRa gateways with detailed statistics including packet counts, channel statistics, error rates, and last seen timestamp.

originalRequest.description: Retrieve registered LoRa gateways with detailed statistics including packet counts, channel statistics, error rates, and last seen timestamp.

request.description: Retrieve registered LoRa end devices with device EUI, class, profile IDs, join counters, and last seen timestamp.

originalRequest.description: Retrieve registered LoRa end devices with device EUI, class, profile IDs, join counters, and last seen timestamp.

request.description: Retrieve the complete LoRa network server configuration including address range, backup interval, Basic Station settings, ChirpStack configuration, and packet forwarder settings.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Retrieve all active LoRa device sessions with detailed information including device identifiers, session keys, frame counters, radio parameters, and channel configuration.
Schedule a firmware upgrade (FOTA) operation for LoRa devices using multicast. The firmware file must be uploaded separately using the upload_lora_fota_file command.
Schedule a multicast message to be sent to multiple LoRa devices. Supports Hexadecimal, Base64, and Binary payload formats.
Retrieve the progress of ongoing FOTA operations including current phase and completion percentage.
Retrieve list of scheduled FOTA and multicast message operations waiting to execute.
Cancel a scheduled FOTA or multicast message operation before it executes.
Retrieve results of completed FOTA operations including success/failure counts and completion time.
Comprehensive system overview with all critical stats
Cellular radio statistics (with inactivity flag for continuous monitoring)
